title: Lowest Access to Clean Cooking Fuels
description: In 2022, only 0.1% of Burundi's population had access to clean fuels and technologies for cooking, the lowest in the world.

title: Lowest Internet Usage Among Females
description: As of 2017, only 1.5% of the female population in Burundi used the Internet, marking one of the lowest rates globally.

title: Highest Risk of Impoverishing Surgical Costs
description: In 2022, 100% of Burundi's population was at risk of impoverishing expenditure for surgical care, the highest globally.

title: Highest Prevalence of Stunting in Children
description: In 2024, 55.3% of children under 5 in Burundi were stunted, the highest prevalence in the world.

title: Highest Employment in Agriculture
description: In 2023, 85.1% of Burundi's total employment was in agriculture, the highest percentage globally.
